A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was such a disappointment. I feel as though I overestimated The Last Jedi after seeing The Force Awakens and Rogue One. The plot has so many illogical flaws and the characters portrayed as powerful in the comics were just frustrating and wasteful. Rian Johnson had so many chances to make this movie amazing\, but now I feel that I need to go back and rewatch the old movie to reignite my fizzled love for Star Wars.
